text: I’m hosting interns in DC and those interested should apply by July 8th for priority consideration! https://t.co/Vmzv1fG4vT

We cannot keep ignoring this problem at the expense of taxpayers, and my budget will put our nation on track to solve this crisis that Congress created. https://t.co/PsSveR2LC5 https://t.co/Xl43ZtMzS8

It was great meeting with community members in Adairville, Ky. As I’ve heard all across the Commonwealth, a top issue on their minds was inflation. Inflation might be an ‘invisible tax’, but Kentuckians are feeling it heavily at the gas pump and grocery store. https://t.co/D8u1fct1Hx

On my last stop today, I visited Druther’s of Campbellsville, Ky to present them with the Senate Small Business of the Week award. Druther’s continues to provide a sense of nostalgia that their loyal customers love. Congratulations to Steve and the entire Druther’s team! https://t.co/JCdh3kfcWb

Another successful public forum with the liberty-loving citizens of Liberty, KY. Our country was uniquely conceived on the idea that our natural rights come from God, and Liberty embodies that spirit well. In fact, they even have their own replica Liberty Bell! https://t.co/7viAi8e3vW

We had a great turnout at our public forum in Jamestown, Ky. I enjoyed discussing solutions to issues like inflation, workforce participation, and Biden’s border crisis. Thank you Russell County! https://t.co/zrQ8FZU87f

ICYMI: I had a great conversation about inflation and more on @kevinrobertstx! 

Rand Paul: Calling Biden out for Rising Inflation https://t.co/agJhhYtCd8 https://t.co/2uYZMVYzCg

This morning I met with the Barren County Chamber of Commerce. We agreed that county governments should be a model for federal government because they budget within their means and don’t have access to an unlimited printing press. https://t.co/LhS3TujsJB
Glad to join @KevinRobertsTX to discuss the disaster inflation hurting KY and our entire country. https://t.co/2v4P0TIhfN

I’m proud to join pro-life senators pledging to block any bill that would undermine the Hyde Amendment, which prohibits taxpayer funding for abortion, or any other pro-life protections. https://t.co/4JH1a7obPZ https://t.co/kfbRCkl3ug
We believe that the American taxpayer deserves to know the degree to which government doctors and researchers have a financial interest in drugs and products they support… https://t.co/VBqWKBUXBU
